message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I believe it's worth $12,000 to you. I'm willing to let it go for $13,000.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest but $9,000 is significantly lower than what I'm willing to accept. Let's split the difference - I'm willing to sell for $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking $10,250. Would you be willing to sell the product for that price?
